description: A podcast about tabletop gaming -- roleplaying, wargaming, board games and the like, and the people who play them.
title: All Games Considered

episodes.title: Oops... (Not Episode 3)
episodes.description:
Oops!

Mark made an error during the process of pre-editing and editing Episode 3, so here is the explanation for why the episode is going to be late, as well as a bit of a peek behind the curtain for folks thinking about doing a podcast. Learn from my mistakes people!

Episode 3 should go live on March 29th. Whether the regular schedule will shift to follow that or revert to something close to what we were doing before is yet to be determined.

Thanks!
